H0.text: Buenos Aires is the capital of which South American country. Argentina

H1.text: Buenos Aires is the capital of which South American country. Chile

H2.text: Buenos Aires is the capital of which South American country. Uruguay

H3.text: Buenos Aires is the capital of which South American country. Argie

A4.text: Buenos Aires, officially the Autonomous City of Buenos Aires, is the capital and largest city of Argentina.
